channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8202931] [macos] java/awt/Choice/ChoicePopupLocation/ChoicePopupLocation.java fails
item.description:
java/awt/Choice/ChoicePopupLocation/ChoicePopupLocation.java fails
repeatably on MacOS 10.12

----------System.out:(0/0)----------
----------System.err:(15/871)----------
java.lang.RuntimeException
at ChoicePopupLocation.openPopup(ChoicePopupLocation.java:123)
at ChoicePopupLocation.test(ChoicePopupLocation.java:100)
at ChoicePopupLocation.main(ChoicePopupLocation.java:68)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:569)
at com.sun.javatest.regtest.agent.MainWrapper$MainThread.run(MainWrapper.java:115)
at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:832)

JavaTest Message: Test threw exception: java.lang.RuntimeException
JavaTest Message: shutting down test

STATUS:Failed.`main' threw exception: java.lang.RuntimeException

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fix request [11u]

I backport this for parity with 11.0.23-oracle.
No risk, only a test change.
Clean backport.
Test passes. SAP nightly testing passed.

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk11u-dev/pull/2433
Date: 2024-01-04 06:09:06 +0000

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk17u-dev/pull/1908
Date: 2023-10-24 08:38:29 +0000

Fix request [17u]

I backport this for parity with 17.0.10-oracle.
No risk, only a test change.
Resolved ProblemList.
Test passes on mac. SAP nightly testing passed.

Changeset: f80faced
Author: Damon Nguyen <dnguyen@openjdk.org>
Committer: Harshitha Onkar <honkar@openjdk.org>
Date: 2022-12-21 20:10:52 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/f80faced6e6c6c1b10541a8b0c91625215c9ef43

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/11277
Date: 2022-11-21 20:56:40 +0000
I still cannot reproduce it, will check in a full test run. Probable it is affected by some other test.
On my system the test passed 100 times in a row.

And on Ubuntu 16.04 ...
